timeline.message:
Add adminGetReadOnlyHtml()

Add serviceAccountStaticNotebooksApi

Switch to non-String body due to Swagger bugs

timeline.bodyText: Please update the PR description with the general approach here. I didn't expect to see FC cloud changes, but it makes sense.
timeline.author: jaycarlton

timeline.bodyText: Looks like these three lines could be their own helper function called by both beans.
timeline.author: jaycarlton

replies.bodyText: I'm not sure that gets us much
replies.author: jmthibault79

replies.bodyText: it's easy to do and makes it obvious that it's the same bean but with different ApiClients.
replies.author: jaycarlton

timeline.bodyText: nit: change context to unused here and below.
timeline.author: jaycarlton

replies.bodyText: the whole file uses this style.  I'm going to keep it like this
replies.author: jmthibault79

timeline.bodyText: Huh. I'm surprised there's not a flag or something to avoid this.
timeline.author: jaycarlton

timeline.bodyText: super-nit: I'd kind of expect the notebook name to come before the reason, as it's the third in a line of increasingly specific identifiers.
timeline.author: jaycarlton

timeline.bodyText: Can you please add a unit test on this service (and possibly notebooks service)? I'm especially interested in showing this serialization workaround.
timeline.author: jaycarlton
